title: Best laid plans
creator_credit: John Edwards, Don Anderson and Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production
brief_description: Two boys, one a diabetic, are overdue after a bushwalk. Basic bush search techniques are described in detail as rescue workers hunt for the boys.
creator_credit_for_label: John Edwards, Don Anderson and Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production
